summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5821 for the improvement of Hillman Place, from East 60th Street to East 65th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76697 as amended by Ordinance No. 76851, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
